data.actual_result: Unable to join voice channel until user joins a different voice channel, whether it is the same server or not, and then reconnect
data.short_description: Once banned, cannot join the same voice channel user was in when banned
data.steps_to_repro: - Get banned - Get unbanned and invited - Click to join voice channel you were originally in
